      • createFlat

        public Response createFlat(Context context,
                           java.lang.String password)
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        password - password for accessing created flat
        Returns:
        Response object with flat id (int)
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - created
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • getFlatMembers

        public Response getFlatMembers(Context context,
                               int flatID)
        Returns list of members signed to given flat
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        flatID - ID of current user's flat
        Returns:
        Response object with List of users IDs' (Integer)
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - retrieved
        - MESSAGE_FORBIDDEN - not a member of given flat
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • changePassword

        public Response changePassword(Context context,
                               int flatID,
                               java.lang.String oldPassword,
                               java.lang.String newPassword)
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        flatID - ID of flat to change password
        oldPassword - Old password
        newPassword - New password
        Returns:
        Response object
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - changed
        - MESSAGE_FORBIDDEN - incorrect password

      • getUserID

        public Response getUserID(Context context,
                          java.lang.String flatName)
        Retrieves flat's ID when given name
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        flatName - Name of a flat
        Returns:
        Response object with ID (int)
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - retrieved
        - MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND - flat not found
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • getFlat

        public Response getFlat(Context context,
                        int flatID)
        Retrieves name of given flat
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        flatID - ID of a flat
        Returns:
        Response object with flat name
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - retrieved
        - MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND - flat not found
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized
